meanings.definition: A person, especially a young woman, who is considered attractive or sexually appealing.
meanings.sent1: The hotties at the party turned heads.
meanings.sent2: Let's go to the beach and check out the hotties.
meanings.sent3: The movie had so many hotties, it was like a fashion show.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were filled with hotties, like flowers in a garden.
meanings.sent5: She stood out among the crowd of hotties, like a shining star.

meanings.definition: A group of attractive individuals, typically used informally or colloquially.
meanings.sent1: We saw a bunch of hotties hanging out by the cafe.
meanings.sent2: The hotties in the band always draw a big crowd.
meanings.sent3: The team of hotties made the game more exciting to watch.
meanings.sent4: The park was full of hotties enjoying the sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The group of hotties added a touch of glamour to the event.
